channel.title: AKA (playtest)
channel.description:
*If you've already played this with me, please hold off for 24 hours to give other people a chance first. Thank you!*
AKA is a espionage focused action thriller game inspired by the TV show Alias.
We follow the career of a young intelligence officer, discovering that the agency she works for is a front for a criminal organisation, balancing professional and personal commitments while maintaining her cover as a double agent.
This is a playtest of a game I'm currently developing, please sign up only if you are comfortable with providing feedback and adjusting rules and procedures as we play.
![AKA-AltCover|353x500](upload://sLizO9x2BaDoJG6u1XI6RxLpkDB.jpeg)
**Content Warning**: fraught and duplicitous relationships, betrayal, violence **Duration**: Four 3-hour sessions **Breaks**: 2 breaks (5-10 mins each) or as required **Venue**: GM’s Zoom **Recording**: Yes, but made public only with all players' enthusiastic consent! **Attendance**: Joining all sessions is ideal but not required **Safety**: Lines & Veils, Script Change, and Open Door Policy. Tools can be changed to suit the players. This game will follow the Gauntlet Community Code of Conduct.
